name: Rush Bot
description:
I love the classic sliding block puzzle game Rush Hour created by Nob Yoshigarahara. For AI and Games Jam 2022, I decided to try my hand at making a Rush Hour solver. Lots of others already exist, and mine will never be the best, but it's a fun intellectual challenge.

The deadline for the game jam has come so I am submitting an early draft of the AI that makes only-slightly-better-than-random moves. My current version is more strategic but too buggy for public consumption. I expect to be tinkering away at it for a few weeks yet.
